QuestData.Title: Phantom Potion
QuestData.Description: Every turn you take in Ashran you run into danger. But don't fret $n, I've developed the perfect solution. It's my very own riff on the popular Invisibility Potion. $B$BI'm just missing one of the ingredients: cave mushrooms. $B$BLuckily, a variety grows right here in Ashran.
